properties.description: This is new linked service for pipeline1 and azure data storage

scriptLines: Address as (state as string, country as string, zipcode as string),
Contact as (Phone as string, email as string)
employee1, employee2, employee3, employee4 union(byName: true)~> unionAllEmployees
disjoint: false) ~> split1@(employee1, employee2, employee3, employee4)
